readable.title: 3080891382_edf83dde18
readable.content: A child covers their mouth as they whisper to a friend . A child in green winter clothes is holding his or her hand up while two other children look at him or her . Three children , dressed in heavy coats , gloves , and knit caps , cover their mouths . Two children stand and whisper to each other as another looks on . two young children wearing wool caps and mitten covering their mouths while whispering to each other .
